effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.sword_shield: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.
